item.title: Pandas for Data Analisys
item.description: In my professional career I have had to work with large amounts of data and I have been able to learn how to use some analysis tools, one of them is Pandas. So, why don’t we take a look at what Pandas is and what it offers us? Pandas is a library for data analysis and data manipulation in Python. It provides data structures and functions needed to work on structured data seamlessly.
